sense.def:
Water
je čista, brezbarvna tekočina brez okusa in vonja; je nujno potrebna za življenje vseh rastlin in živali.

Izraz
water
ali
waters
uporabljamo, kadar govorimo o veliki količini ali območju vode, na primer jezeru ali morju.

seg.quote: The children played at the water's edge.

sense.def:
A country's waters
sestavlja vodna površina blizu neke države, za katero velja, da sodi k njej.

seg.quote: The ship was in British waters.

sense.def:
To water plants
pomeni naliti vodo na prst, da bi rastline dobro uspevale.

One's eyes water
rečemo, kadar ima človek solze v očeh in ga zato pečejo.

seg.quote: The onions made his eyes water.

sense.def:
One's mouth waters
rečemo, kadar v ustih nastaja več sline, navadno zato, ker duhamo ali vidimo slastno hrano.

seg.quote: This should make your mouth water.

sense.def:
To pass water
pomeni izločiti seč.

Kadar je neki dogodek
water under the bridge
, se je zgodil in ga ni mogoče spremeniti, zato nima smisla, da bi nas še skrbelo zaradi njega.

To water down food or drink
pomeni dodati vodo hrani ali pijači, da postane bolj blaga.

seg.quote: The milk had been watered down.

sense.def:
Kadar je govor ali načrt
watered down
, je poskrbljeno, da je manj silovit.

seg.quote: The whole article had been watered down.
